msgUsage:
Usage: uvach <adhyaya number> [<optional shloka number>]
Pass at least the adhyaya number 1-18!
msgTitle: Srimad Bhagvat Gita adhyaya %s title is "%s"
msgUvach:
Srimad Bhagvat Gita adhyaya %s, shloka %s is

%s
errInvalidShloka: Error: Invalid shloka number %s for adhyaya number %s!
msgAdhyayaNum: There are total 18 adhyaya in SrimadBhagvatGita!
